title: 14-Gauge Round Point Mud Shovel with USA Pattern and Fiberglass Long Handle
description: The Bully Tools 14-Gauge Round Point Mud Shovel's blade measures 9 in. x 11 in. with a 48.25 in. handle. Tool measures 58.25 in. long. Other features include 71 drain holes and a reinforced handle. The Bully Tools Round Point Mud Shovel comes with a limited lifetime warranty that protects against defects in material and workmanship. Founded in 1994. Bully Tools manufactures gardening and farm tools, shingle removers, floor scrapers, forestry and other specialty tools. With an unprecedented history of quality, Bully Tools is committed to applying the same reliability to our business practices. Bully Tools continues to grow and adapt to meet the ever changing needs of the economy and their consumers.
